summary: An Ordinance refunding the purchase price ($350.00) paid for certain certificates of purchase for property sold din error for the Condemnation of Second Avenue, under Ordinance No. 9311 authorizing the drawing and payment of warrants on the General Fund, the Second Avenue Condemnation Fund, and the excess Tax Sales Deposit Fund, and providing for the cancellation of said certificates of purchase and correcting the City Treasurer's records.
